attributes.action: Do not let Walsall Council shut down Foxhills Riding Centre for housing!
attributes.background:
Walsall Council have approved a Torquay based company to build four high value bunglows on the same land as Foxhills Riding Centre. 

Foxhills is a local riding school in Bar Beacon. It has been around for 50 years and employs 5 members of staff and 20 volunteers who all have a love for horses.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Walsall Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://cms.walsall.gov.uk/index/council_and_democracy/petitions.htm
